fi.luupanu.skrapple.logic.actions

Class Move

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.luupanu.skrapple.logic.actions.GameAction
      • fi.luupanu.skrapple.logic.actions.Move

  • public class Move
extends GameAction
    Move is used by the player to confirm the letters placed on the board. This starts a sequence of events where we need to: 1) validate the LetterQueue, 2) create Words, 3) check the Words using a Dictionary, 4) place all letters in queue to the board, 5) clear LetterQueue 6) update the current player's score, 7) clear WordCreator 8) clear Neighbours and 9) refill the current player's Rack.
    Author:
    panu
